pullRequest.title: HBASE-24650 Change the return types of the new checkAndMutate methods…

nodes.bodyText: For IA.Public, we do not use the IS annotation since it should always be Stable.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@

+package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client;
+
+import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
+import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceStability;
+
+/**
+ * Represents a result of a CheckAndMutate operation
+ */
+@InterfaceAudience.Public
+@InterfaceStability.Evolving

nodes.bodyText: We have already make use of generic type so why here we still need to cast?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -349,7 +349,7 @@ private void preCheck() {
           loc, stub, mutation,
           (rn, rm) -> RequestConverter.buildMutateRequest(rn, row, family, qualifier, op, value,
             null, timeRange, rm),
-          resp -> resp.getExists()))
+          resp -> ((CheckAndMutateResult) resp).isSuccess()))

nodes.bodyText: Object is too generic. Please explain why we need to do this change?
Okay. I will remove the IS annotation. Thanks.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+/*

+ * limitations under the License.

+package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client;
+
+import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
+import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceStability;
+
+/**
+ * Represents a result of a CheckAndMutate operation
+ */
+@InterfaceAudience.Public
+@InterfaceStability.Evolving

nodes.bodyText: I will modify it to make use of generic type. Thanks.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -349,7 +349,7 @@ private void preCheck() {
           loc, stub, mutation,
           (rn, rm) -> RequestConverter.buildMutateRequest(rn, row, family, qualifier, op, value,
             null, timeRange, rm),
-          resp -> resp.getExists()))
+          resp -> ((CheckAndMutateResult) resp).isSuccess()))

nodes.bodyText: The reason why I changed Result to Object here is that this method is used by both checkAndMutate() and mutateRow() and we need to use different types each case (respectively CheckAndMutateResult and Result). However as you mentioned, we can make use of generic type here. I will modify it. Thanks.

beforeCommit.message: HBASE-24650 Change the return types of the new CheckAndMutate methods introduced in HBASE-8458

afterCommit.message: HBASE-24650 Change the return types of the new CheckAndMutate methods introduced in HBASE-8458

beforeCommit.message: HBASE-24650 Change the return types of the new CheckAndMutate methods introduced in HBASE-8458

afterCommit.message: HBASE-24650 Change the return types of the new CheckAndMutate methods introduced in HBASE-8458

nodes.bodyText: OK, so the problem here is that, the result for a multi operation is an Object? And we will have two types, one is Result, for normal mutateRow, and the other is CheckAndMutateResult, for checkAndMutate?
Yeah that's better. I will change it.
Yes, correct. Previously, we returned only Result type but after this fix, we will return Result (for normal mutateRow) and CheckAndMutateResult (for checkAndMutate). So I used a generic type here.
